Text: FW Additional Material on Exclusive JurisdictionMessage From Jeffrey Watkiss mailto Sent Monday January PM To Subject Additional Material on Exclusive Jurisdiction Attached is FERC Chairman Jim Hoeckers conurrence with the FERCs December order in the SDGE complaint case Note the discussion on page where he asserts very broad jurisdiciton to order refunds and address any unlawful behavior by sellers under section of the Federal Power Act HOECKERwpd
